name: LordKaT Live tweaks
description: Tweaks the live.lordkat.com layout to work better for my setup, which has a single browser window taking up 2/3 of my screen. These are my personal preferences, take them or leave them - or use this as a base to make your own.
additional_info:
Version 1.1: Updated for new layout
Version 1.0: First release on userstyles.org
